https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/t48XBPwzywpuJEus3hwuIYUbO54.jpg In 1993 one short brutal act guaranteed John Wayne Bobbitt a notoriety that he can never shake off. Film-maker Vicky Hamburger went to find out what happened to the man with the world's most famous penis. Chopped Off: The Man Who Lost His Penis
